body_html:
By default it ShareExternalPointer calculates capacity of it’s not passed anything for the third argument. Which part do we want to test? Maybe having an assert that storage capacity
= tensor capacity might be good, but I don’t want to inadvertently crash
any programs before I am ultimately removing ShareExternalPointer.
…

body:
By default it ShareExternalPointer calculates capacity of it’s not passed
anything for the third argument.

Which part do we want to test? Maybe having an assert that storage capacity
>= tensor capacity might be good, but I don’t want to inadvertently crash
any programs before I am ultimately removing ShareExternalPointer.
On Fri, Oct 12, 2018 at 10:19 AM Edward Z. Yang <notifications@github.com>
wrote:
